arts.ttl: PLAYER RATINGS | Augsburg 0-1 Borussia Dortmund: Disciplined BVB win again
arts.sum: Augsburg played host to Borussia Dortmund to kick off Matchday 9 of the Bundesliga season, looking to ease the pressure on manager Sandro Wagner. Meanwhile, Dortmund were eager to build…

arts.ttl: Guirassy fires Dortmund to victory against Augsburg
arts.sum: A solitary Serhou Guirassy goal is enough to give Borussia Dortmund victory against Augsburg in the Bundesliga.

arts.ttl: Serhou Guirassy strike helps Borussia Dortmund edge past Augsburg
arts.sum: Serhou Guirassy scored his first Bundesliga goal in over a month as Borussia Dortmund kept the pressure on leaders Bayern Munich with victory at struggling Augsburg. Meanwhile, Dortmund's first sight of goal came in the 35th minute when Maximilian Beier headed over from a Pascal Groß delivery.

arts.ttl: Guirassy goal gives Dortmund the edge in arm-wrestle with Augsburg

arts.ttl: Confirmed lineups: FC Augsburg vs. Borussia Dortmund
arts.sum: Here are the confirmed lineups for the clash of Augsburg and Dortmund to commence Matchday 9 of the Bundesliga.

arts.ttl: Dortmund updates: Schlotterbeck to miss out against Augsburg – Can set for return to squad
arts.sum: Ruhr Nachrichten reports that Nico Schlotterbeck will be rested for Borussia Dortmund’s trip to Augsburg on Friday, while Emre Can is set to make his long-awaited return to the squad.

arts.ttl: Borussia Dortmund XI vs Augsburg – Predicted lineup and team news
arts.sum: Borussia Dortmund are set to take on Augsburg at the WWK Arena this Friday evening in their next Bundesliga fixture. arts.sum: Two teams in very different veins of form in FC Augsburg and Borussia Dortmund clash on Friday evening to kick-start Matchday 9 of the Bundesliga - here's our preview for the game below.

arts.ttl: Niko Kovač hints at rotation against Augsburg
arts.sum: Borussia Dortmund needed 120 minutes and penalties to beat Eintracht Frankfurt on Tuesday night and ahead of Friday’s Bundesliga clash against Augsburg, Niko Kovač hinted at squad rotation. Following Stuttgart’s…
